member.name: T:Microsoft.IdentityModel.Validators.AadIssuerValidator
member.summary: Generic class that validates the issuer for either JsonWebTokens or JwtSecurityTokens issued from the Microsoft identity platform (AAD).

member.name: M:Microsoft.IdentityModel.Validators.AadIssuerValidator.Validate(System.String,Microsoft.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken,Microsoft.IdentityModel.Tokens.TokenValidationParameters)
member.summary: Validate the issuer for single and multi-tenant applications of various audiences (Work and School accounts, or Work and School accounts + Personal accounts) and the various clouds.
member.param: The to be used for validating the token.
member.remarks: The issuer is considered as valid if it has the same HTTP scheme and authority as the authority from the configuration file, has a tenant ID, and optionally v2.0 (if this web API accepts both V1 and V2 tokens).
member.returns: The issuer if it's valid, or otherwise SecurityTokenInvalidIssuerException is thrown.
member.exception: if the issuer is invalid or if there is a network issue.

member.name: M:Microsoft.IdentityModel.Validators.AadIssuerValidator.ValidateAsync(System.String,Microsoft.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken,Microsoft.IdentityModel.Tokens.TokenValidationParameters)
member.summary: Validate the issuer for single and multi-tenant applications of various audiences (Work and School accounts, or Work and School accounts + Personal accounts) and the various clouds.
member.param: The to be used for validating the token.
member.remarks: The issuer is considered as valid if it has the same HTTP scheme and authority as the authority from the configuration file, has a tenant ID, and optionally v2.0 (if this web API accepts both V1 and V2 tokens).
member.returns: The issuer if it's valid, or otherwise SecurityTokenInvalidIssuerException is thrown.
member.exception: if the issuer is invalid or if there is a network issue.

member.name: M:Microsoft.IdentityModel.Validators.AadIssuerValidator.GetAadIssuerValidator(System.String,System.Net.Http.HttpClient)
member.summary: Gets an for an Azure Active Directory (AAD) authority.
member.param: The authority to create the validator for, e.g. https://login.microsoftonline.com/.
Optional HttpClient to use to retrieve the endpoint metadata (can be null).

member.summary: Gets an for an Azure Active Directory (AAD) authority.
member.param: The authority to create the validator for, e.g. https://login.microsoftonline.com/.

member.summary: Gets an for an Azure Active Directory (AAD) authority.
member.param: The authority to create the validator for, e.g. https://login.microsoftonline.com/.
Optional HttpClient to use to retrieve the endpoint metadata (can be null).
Configuration manager provider. Injection point for metadata managed outside of the class.

member.name: M:Microsoft.IdentityModel.Validators.AadIssuerValidator.GetTenantIdFromToken(Microsoft.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken)
member.summary: Gets the tenant ID from a token.
member.returns: A string containing the tenant ID, if found or .

member.name: T:Microsoft.IdentityModel.Validators.AadTokenValidationParametersExtension
member.summary: A generic class for additional validation checks on issued by the Microsoft identity platform (AAD).

member.name: M:Microsoft.IdentityModel.Validators.AadTokenValidationParametersExtension.EnableAadSigningKeyIssuerValidation(Microsoft.IdentityModel.Tokens.TokenValidationParameters)
member.summary: Enables the validation of the issuer of the signing keys used by the Microsoft identity platform (AAD) against the issuer of the token.
member.param: The that are used to validate the token.

member.name: M:Microsoft.IdentityModel.Validators.AadTokenValidationParametersExtension.ValidateIssuerSigningKey(Microsoft.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKey,Microsoft.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken,Microsoft.IdentityModel.Tokens.BaseConfiguration)
member.summary: Validates the issuer signing key.
member.param: The being validated, could be a JwtSecurityToken or JsonWebToken.
member.returns: true if the issuer signing key is valid; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Microsoft.IdentityModel.Validators.AadTokenValidationParametersExtension.ValidateIssuerSigningKeyCertificate(Microsoft.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKey,Microsoft.IdentityModel.Tokens.TokenValidationParameters)
member.summary: Validates the issuer signing key certificate.
member.param: The that are used to validate the token.
member.returns: true if the issuer signing key certificate is valid; otherwise, false.
